text: Arvind Pandey is an Indian politician and member of the Bharatiya Janata Party. Pandey is a member of the Uttarakhand Legislative Assembly from the Gadarpur Uttarakhand Assembly constituency Gadarpur constituency in Udham Singh Nagar district.Bharatiya Janata Party to State election commissionMy NetaCASE FILED AGAINST ARVIND PANDEY FOR THREATENING SDM, CO Pandey is a member of cabinet in the state of Uttarakhand headed by chief minister Trivendra Singh Rawat. Currently Pandey is minister for primary education and sports in government of Uttarakhand. A total of 12 criminal cases have been filed against Pandey.Uttarakhand Assembly has 22 MLAs with criminal records including MurderMy Neta Info == References == == External links == # Category:People from Udham Singh Nagar district Category:Bharatiya Janata Party politicians from Uttarakhand Category:Members of the Uttarakhand Legislative Assembly Category:Living people Category:21st-century Indian politicians Category:Year of birth missing (living people)
title: Arvind Pandey
